sys_element_mapping.value: NeedIt task {{ab755850-e6dc-45ff-9f89-4d34d27fd6eb.item.number}} was closed because its Due date ({{ab755850-e6dc-45ff-9f89-4d34d27fd6eb.item.due_date}}) was older than the oldest applicable date for a task to be executed, which is {{4160e2cb-efb6-469a-9741-e97c5f2797c3.property_value}} earlier than the current date.
